reviewText:
Here is a chance to see some if your favorite classic tv characters before they became famous.
For example, Carolyn Jones ("Mortisha" on the Addams Family) appears in two different episodes.

Cesar Romero had been in movies for over twenty years by the time he starred in this series.
The episodes are exciting, but they can still be watched by the whole family. There is minimal violence.

There are several complete sample episodes posted on you tube - I would encourage you to check them out

In this black & white TV series from 1954, Cesar Romero plays a diplomatic courier who makes a dangerous visit to a foreign city in each  episode. Titles in this volume are "Rome," "Paris," "Geneva," and "Prague."
